description.narrative: - Improve food security: CS supplies fertilizers to farmers in 14 provinces and 2 autonomous regions in China, of which ten are classified as frontier regions by the International Development Association (IDA). The fertilizers help enhance the yield of the farmland and hence address food security issues in China. - Promote the applications of an environmentally-friendly material: Weight reduction is the most cost effective means to reduce fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions from the transportation sector. Generally, it has been estimated that for every 10 percent of weight eliminated from a vehicle''s total weight, fuel economy improves by 7 percent. Magnesium alloy is one of the lightest structural materials used in automobiles -- 75 percent lighter than steel and 33 percent lighter than aluminum. The Chinese government encourages the development and application of high-performance magnesium alloys, as stated in its twelfth 5-year plan. - Employment creation and local linkages: The Project is expected to create approximately 1,000 new job opportunities, of which 600 are in Jilin, a frontier province. The Project is also expected to spur the growth of local supply of goods and services, such as machinery, raw materials, and transportation services.

Century Sunshine Group Holdings Limited (CS or the Company) is a public company listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (Ticker: 0509). Founded in 2000, CSs businesses include ecological fertilizers and magnesium alloys, with main manufacturing facilities located in Donghai, Jiangsu province and Baishan, Jilin province respectively. CS is currently considering the following expansion plan by 2016 (the Project): (1) increasing the production capacity of its fertilizer manufacturing facility from 300,000 tons to 750,000 tons at the Donghai site; and (2) increasing the production capacity of its magnesium (Mg) manufacturing facility from 16,000 tons to 75,000 tons at the Baishan site.

name.narrative: At the Donghai site, CS owns an open-pit serpentine mine. The fertilizer plant is adjacent to the mine with sulfuric/phosphoric acid manufacturing facilities. The main products are compound fertilizer (NPK or Si-Mg-NPK) and organic fertilizer which use agriculture wastes as raw materials. Si-Mg is from serpentine mine. At the Baishan site, CS owns an open-pit dolomite mine and dolomite is used as the raw material for Mg alloy. The Mg smelting and refining plant is 15 km from the mine.
